cab.content: From:- General Hanbury WilliamsOPERATIONSG.T. 588.C I.G.S.WAR CABINETApril 28th 1-917.Handed in 8 a.m.1003. My 992. To-morrow Alexieff and Admiral Rousin leave for Pekof to meet General Russki and a representative of Baltic fleetj and to discuss the situation there. On his return Rousin hs promised to report to me. Reports which he has received from Baltic show signs of improvement, but he* thinks hem too optimistic. - In Gulf of Finland ice is beginning to move slowly, and in Gulf of Riga it is clearing rapidly.
